en-US.title: Endocrinology, Diabetes & Metabolism Care by Dr. Shannon K. Oates, MD, FACE
en-US.description: Dr. Shannon K. Oates, MD, FACE specialises in endocrinology, diabetes, and metabolism. She provides tailored care to each patient and is passionate about educational sessions. The office accepts a broad range of insurance plans. Although it doesn't specify services tailored for the transgender community, endocrinology plays a key role in many transition processes.
